publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5286 Linda Fabiani: Peace Brigades International - 25th Anniversary—That the Parliament congratulates Peace Brigades International (PBI) on its 25th anniversary and commends the work that has been done to date in providing protective accompaniment to non-violent human rights defenders around the world; supports and applauds both the courageous human rights defenders that PBI protects and the commitment of its volunteers in their efforts to promote respect for human rights, justice and international humanitarian law; recognises the value of non-violent resolution in many conflict situations, and looks forward to the continuation of Peace Brigades International’s life-saving and vital work.

S2M-5286 Linda Fabiani: Peace Brigades International - 25th Anniversary—That the Parliament congratulates Peace Brigades International (PBI) on its 25th anniversary and commends the work that has been done to date in providing protective accompaniment to non-violent human rights defenders around the world; supports and applauds both the courageous human rights defenders that PBI protects and the commitment of its volunteers in their efforts to promote respect for human rights, justice and international humanitarian law; recognises the value of non-violent resolution in many conflict situations, and looks forward to the continuation of Peace Brigades International’s life-saving and vital work.
S2M-5286 Peace Brigades International - 25th Anniversary (lodged on 6 December 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*, Christine Grahame*, Fiona Hyslop*, Campbell Martin*

S2M-5286 Peace Brigades International - 25th Anniversary (lodged on 6 December 2006) Chris Ballance*, Shiona Baird*, Robin Harper*, Bruce Crawford*, John Swinburne*, Patrick Harvie*, Mike Pringle*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Rosie Kane*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-5286 Peace Brigades International - 25th Anniversary (lodged on 6 December 2006) Richard Lochhead*, Alex Neil*
S2M-5286 Peace Brigades International - 25th Anniversary (lodged on 6 December 2006) Tommy Sheridan*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-5286 Peace Brigades International - 25th Anniversary (lodged on 6 December 2006) Eleanor Scott*
S2M-5286 Peace Brigades International - 25th Anniversary (lodged on 6 December 2006) Ms Maureen Watt*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-5286 Peace Brigades International - 25th Anniversary (lodged on 6 December 2006) Dennis Canavan*

S2M-5286 Linda Fabiani: Peace Brigades International - 25th Anniversary—That the Parliament congratulates Peace Brigades International (PBI) on its 25th anniversary and commends the work that has been done to date in providing protective accompaniment to non-violent human rights defenders around the world; supports and applauds both the courageous human rights defenders that PBI protects and the commitment of its volunteers in their efforts to promote respect for human rights, justice and international humanitarian law; recognises the value of non-violent resolution in many conflict situations, and looks forward to the continuation of Peace Brigades International’s life-saving and vital work. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Christine Grahame, Fiona Hyslop, Campbell Martin, Chris Ballance, Shiona Baird, Robin Harper, Bruce Crawford, John Swinburne, Patrick Harvie, Mike Pringle, Rob Gibson, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Carolyn Leckie, Frances Curran, Rosie Kane, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Jamie Stone, Richard Lochhead, Alex Neil, Tommy Sheridan, Michael Matheson, Eleanor Scott, Ms Maureen Watt, Roseanna Cunningham, Dennis Canavan
